gmail.GmailApp.name: GmailApp
gmail.GmailApp.doc: GmailApp Provides access to Gmail threads, messages, and labels.

method.name: createLabel
method.doc: Create a new user label of the given name.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the new label

method.name: deleteLabel
method.doc: Deletes the specified label.

argument.name: label
argument.doc: the label to delete

method.name: getAliases
method.doc: Gets a list of the emails that are set up as aliases for this account in Gmail.

method.name: getChatThreads
method.doc: Retrieves all chat threads irrespective of labels.

method.name: getChatThreads
method.doc: Retrieves a range of chat threads irrespective of labels.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first thread to retrieve

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to retrieve

method.name: getDraftMessages
method.doc: Retrieves all draft messages.

method.name: getInboxThreads
method.doc: Retrieves all Inbox threads irrespective of labels.

method.name: getInboxThreads
method.doc: Retrieves a range of Inbox threads irrespective of labels.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first thread to retrieve

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to retrieve

method.name: getInboxUnreadCount
method.doc: Gets the number of unread threads in the inbox.

method.name: getMessageById
method.doc: Gets a message by id.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the id of the message to retrieve

method.name: getMessagesForThread
method.doc: Retrieve all messages in the specified thread.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread of messages to retrieve

method.name: getMessagesForThreads
method.doc: Retrieve all messages in the specified threads.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: the threads of messages to retrieve

method.name: getPriorityInboxThreads
method.doc: Retrieves all Priority Inbox threads irrespective of labels.

method.name: getPriorityInboxThreads
method.doc: Retrieves a range of Priority Inbox threads irrespective of labels.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first thread to retrieve

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to retrieve

method.name: getPriorityInboxUnreadCount
method.doc: Gets the number of unread threads in the Priority Inbox.

method.name: getSpamThreads
method.doc: Retrieves all spam threads irrespective of labels.

method.name: getSpamThreads
method.doc: Retrieves a range of spam threads irrespective of labels.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first thread to retrieve

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to retrieve

method.name: getSpamUnreadCount
method.doc: Gets the number of unread threads that are spam.

method.name: getStarredThreads
method.doc: Retrieves all starred threads irrespective of labels.

method.name: getStarredThreads
method.doc: Retrieves a range of starred threads irrespective of labels.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first thread to retrieve

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to retrieve

method.name: getStarredUnreadCount
method.doc: Gets the number of unread threads that are starred.

method.name: getThreadById
method.doc: Gets a thread by id.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the ide of the thread to retrieve

method.name: getTrashThreads
method.doc: Retrieves all trash threads irrespective of labels.

method.name: getTrashThreads
method.doc: Retrieves a range of trash threads irrespective of labels.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the first thread to retrieve

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to retrieve

method.name: getUserLabelByName
method.doc: Retrieves a label given the label name.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the label to retrieve

method.name: getUserLabels
method.doc: Retrieves a list of user-created labels.

method.name: markMessageRead
method.doc: Marks this message read and forces the message to refresh.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the message to mark as read

method.name: markMessageUnread
method.doc: Marks this message unread and forces the message to refresh.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the message to mark as unread

method.name: markMessagesRead
method.doc: Marks these messages read and forces the messages to refresh.

argument.name: messages
argument.doc: an array of messages to mark as read

method.name: markMessagesUnread
method.doc: Marks these messages unread and forces the messages to refresh.

argument.name: messages
argument.doc: an array of messages to mark as unread

method.name: markThreadImportant
method.doc: Marks this thread as important and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to mark as important

method.name: markThreadRead
method.doc: Marks this thread as read and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to mark as read

method.name: markThreadUnimportant
method.doc: Marks this thread as unimportant and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to mark as unimportant

method.name: markThreadUnread
method.doc: Marks this thread unread and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to mark as unread

method.name: markThreadsImportant
method.doc: Marks these threads as important and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to mark as important

method.name: markThreadsRead
method.doc: Marks these threads as read and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to mark as read

method.name: markThreadsUnimportant
method.doc: Marks these threads as unimportant and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to mark as unimportant

method.name: markThreadsUnread
method.doc: Marks these threads as unread and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to mark as unread

method.name: moveMessageToTrash
method.doc: Moves the message to the trash and forces the message to refresh.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the message to be trashed

method.name: moveMessagesToTrash
method.doc: Moves the specified messages to the trash and forces the messages to refresh.

argument.name: messages
argument.doc: the messages to be trashed

method.name: moveThreadToArchive
method.doc: Moves this thread to the archive and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to be archive

method.name: moveThreadToInbox
method.doc: Moves this thread to the inbox and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to be moved to the inbox

method.name: moveThreadToSpam
method.doc: Moves this thread to spam and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to be moved to spam

method.name: moveThreadToTrash
method.doc: Moves this thread to the trash and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to be trashed

method.name: moveThreadsToArchive
method.doc: Moves these threads to the archive and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to be archived

method.name: moveThreadsToInbox
method.doc: Moves these threads to the inbox and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to be moved to the inbox

method.name: moveThreadsToSpam
method.doc: Moves these threads to spam and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to be moved to spam

method.name: moveThreadsToTrash
method.doc: Moves these threads to the trash and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to be trashed

method.name: refreshMessage
method.doc: Reloads the message and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the message to be refreshed

method.name: refreshMessages
method.doc: Reloads the messages and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).

argument.name: messages
argument.doc: the messages to be refreshed

method.name: refreshThread
method.doc: Reloads the thread and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to be refreshed

method.name: refreshThreads
method.doc: Reloads the threads and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: the threads to be refreshed

method.name: search
method.doc: Search Gmail with the given query.

argument.name: query
argument.doc: the search query, as you would type it into Gmail

method.name: search
method.doc: Search Gmail with the given query.

argument.name: query
argument.doc: the search query, as you would type it into Gmail

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the starting thread

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to return

method.name: sendEmail
method.doc: Sends an email message.

argument.name: recipient
argument.doc: comma separated list of email addresses

argument.name: subject
argument.doc: subject of the email

argument.name: body
argument.doc: body of the email

method.name: sendEmail
method.doc: Sends an email message with optional arguments.

argument.name: recipient
argument.doc: the addresses of the recipient

argument.name: subject
argument.doc: the subject line

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

method.name: starMessage
method.doc: Adds a star to this message and forces the message to refresh.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the message to star

method.name: starMessages
method.doc: Adds stars to these messages and forces the messages to refresh.

argument.name: messages
argument.doc: an array of messages to star

method.name: unstarMessage
method.doc: Removes a star from this message and forces the message to refresh.

argument.name: message
argument.doc: the message to unstar

method.name: unstarMessages
method.doc: Removes stars from these messages and forces the messages to refresh.

argument.name: messages
argument.doc: an array of messages to unstar

gmail.GmailAttachment.name: GmailAttachment
gmail.GmailAttachment.doc: GmailAttachment An attachment from Gmail. This is a regular Blob except that it has an extra getSize() method that is faster than calling getBytes().length and does not count against the Gmail read quota. // Logs information about any attachments in the first 100 inbox threads. var threads = GmailApp.getInboxThreads(0, 100); var msgs = GmailApp.getMessagesForThreads(threads); for (var i = 0 ; i < msgs.length; i++) { for (var j = 0; j < msgs[i].length; j++) { var attachments = msgs[i][j].getAttachments(); for (var k = 0; k < attachments.length; k++) { Logger.log('Message "%s" contains the attachment "%s" (%s bytes)', msgs[i][j].getSubject(), attachments[k].getName(), attachments[k].getSize()); } } }

method.name: copyBlob
method.doc: Returns a copy of this blob.

method.name: getAs
method.doc: Return the data inside this object as a blob converted to the specified content type.

argument.name: contentType
argument.doc: the MIME type to convert to. For most blobs, 'application/pdf' is the only valid option. For images in BMP, GIF, JPEG, or PNG format, any of 'image/bmp', 'image/gif', 'image/jpeg', or 'image/png' are also valid.

method.name: getBytes
method.doc: Gets the data stored in this blob.

method.name: getContentType
method.doc: Gets the content type of the bytes in this blob.

method.name: getDataAsString
method.doc: Gets the data of this blob as a String with UTF-8 encoding.

method.name: getDataAsString
method.doc: Gets the data of this blob as a string with the specified encoding.

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: the charset to use in encoding the data in this blob as a string

method.name: getName
method.doc: Gets the name of this blob.

method.name: getSize
method.doc: Gets the size of this attachment.

method.name: isGoogleType
method.doc: Returns whether this blob is a Google Apps file (Sheets, Docs, etc.).

method.name: setBytes
method.doc: Sets the data stored in this blob.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the new data

method.name: setContentType
method.doc: Sets the content type of the bytes in this blob.

argument.name: contentType
argument.doc: the new contentType

method.name: setContentTypeFromExtension
method.doc: Sets the content type of the bytes in this blob based on the file extension.

method.name: setDataFromString
method.doc: Sets the data of this blob from a string with UTF-8 encoding.

argument.name: string
argument.doc: the string data

method.name: setDataFromString
method.doc: Sets the data of this blob from a string with the specified encoding.

argument.name: string
argument.doc: the string data

argument.name: charset
argument.doc: the charset to use in interpreting the string as bytes

method.name: setName
method.doc: Sets the name of this blob.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the new name

gmail.GmailLabel.name: GmailLabel
gmail.GmailLabel.doc: GmailLabel A user-created label in a user's Gmail account.

method.name: addToThread
method.doc: Adds this label to the given thread and forces the thread to refresh (GmailThread.refresh()).

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread to be labeled

method.name: addToThreads
method.doc: Adds this label to the given threads and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to be labeled

method.name: deleteLabel
method.doc: Deletes this label.

method.name: getName
method.doc: Gets the name of this label.

method.name: getThreads
method.doc: Gets the threads that are marked with this label.

method.name: getThreads
method.doc: Gets a range of threads marked with this label.

argument.name: start
argument.doc: the index of the starting thread

argument.name: max
argument.doc: the maximum number of threads to return

method.name: getUnreadCount
method.doc: Gets the number of unread threads tagged with this label.

method.name: removeFromThread
method.doc: Removes this label from the given thread and forces the thread to refresh.

argument.name: thread
argument.doc: the thread be unlabeled

method.name: removeFromThreads
method.doc: Removes this label from the given threads and forces the threads to refresh.

argument.name: threads
argument.doc: an array of threads to be unlabeled

gmail.GmailMessage.name: GmailMessage
gmail.GmailMessage.doc: GmailMessage A message in a user's Gmail account.

method.name: forward
method.doc: Forwards this message to new recipients.

argument.name: recipient
argument.doc: a comma-separated list of email addresses

method.name: forward
method.doc: Forwards this message to new recipients, with optional arguments.

argument.name: recipient
argument.doc: a comma-separated list of email addresses

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

method.name: getAttachments
method.doc: Gets all the attachments for this message.

method.name: getBcc
method.doc: Gets the comma-separated recipients bcc'd on this message.

method.name: getBody
method.doc: Gets the HTML content of the body of this message.

method.name: getCc
method.doc: Gets the comma-separated recipients cc'd on this message.

method.name: getDate
method.doc: Gets the date and time of this message.

method.name: getFrom
method.doc: Gets the sender of this message.

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the id of this message.

method.name: getPlainBody
method.doc: Gets the content of the body of this message without HTML formatting.

method.name: getRawContent
method.doc: Gets the raw content of this message.

method.name: getReplyTo
method.doc: Gets the reply-to address of this message (usually the sender).

method.name: getSubject
method.doc: Gets the subject of this message.

method.name: getThread
method.doc: Gets the thread that contains this message.

method.name: getTo
method.doc: Gets the comma-separated recipient(s) of this message.

method.name: isDraft
method.doc: Gets whether this message is a draft.

method.name: isInChats
method.doc: Gets whether this message is a chat.

method.name: isInInbox
method.doc: Gets whether this message is in the inbox.

method.name: isInTrash
method.doc: Gets whether this message is in the trash.

method.name: isStarred
method.doc: Gets whether this message is starred.

method.name: isUnread
method.doc: Gets whether this message is unread.

method.name: markRead
method.doc: Marks the message as read.

method.name: markUnread
method.doc: Marks the message as unread.

method.name: moveToTrash
method.doc: Moves the message to the trash.

method.name: refresh
method.doc: Reloads this message and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).

method.name: reply
method.doc: Replies to the sender of this message using the reply-to address.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

method.name: reply
method.doc: Replies to the sender of this message using the reply-to address, with optional arguments.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

method.name: replyAll
method.doc: Replies to the sender using the reply-to address and all recipients of this message.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

method.name: replyAll
method.doc: Replies to the sender of this message using the reply-to address and all recipients, with optional arguments.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

method.name: star
method.doc: Stars the message.

method.name: unstar
method.doc: Unstars the message.

gmail.GmailThread.name: GmailThread
gmail.GmailThread.doc: GmailThread A thread in a user's Gmail account.

method.name: addLabel
method.doc: Adds this label to the thread.

argument.name: label
argument.doc: the label to apply to this thread

method.name: getFirstMessageSubject
method.doc: Gets the subject of the first message in the thread.

method.name: getId
method.doc: Gets the ID of this thread.

method.name: getLabels
method.doc: Returns the user-created labels on this thread.

method.name: getLastMessageDate
method.doc: Gets the date of this thread's most recent message.

method.name: getMessageCount
method.doc: Returns the number of messages in the thread.

method.name: getMessages
method.doc: Gets the messages in this thread.

method.name: getPermalink
method.doc: Gets a permalink for this thread.

method.name: hasStarredMessages
method.doc: Returns whether the thread has any starred messages.

method.name: isImportant
method.doc: Returns whether the thread is marked important.

method.name: isInChats
method.doc: Returns whether the thread is labeled a chat.

method.name: isInInbox
method.doc: Returns whether the thread is in the inbox.

method.name: isInSpam
method.doc: Returns whether the thread is marked as spam.

method.name: isInTrash
method.doc: Returns whether the thread is in the trash.

method.name: isUnread
method.doc: Returns whether the thread has any unread messages.

method.name: markImportant
method.doc: Marks this thread as important.

method.name: markRead
method.doc: Marks this thread as read.

method.name: markUnimportant
method.doc: Marks this thread as unimportant.

method.name: markUnread
method.doc: Marks this thread as unread.

method.name: moveToArchive
method.doc: Moves this thread to the archive.

method.name: moveToInbox
method.doc: Moves this thread to the inbox.

method.name: moveToSpam
method.doc: Moves this thread to spam.

method.name: moveToTrash
method.doc: Moves this thread to the trash.

method.name: refresh
method.doc: Reloads this thread, and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).

method.name: removeLabel
method.doc: Removes this label from the thread.

argument.name: label
argument.doc: the label to remove from this thread

method.name: reply
method.doc: Reply to the sender of the last message on this thread using the replyTo address.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

method.name: reply
method.doc: Reply to the sender of the last message on this thread using the replyTo address, with optional arguments.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below

method.name: replyAll
method.doc: Reply to the sender (using the replyTo address), and all recipients of the last message on this thread.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

method.name: replyAll
method.doc: Reply to the sender (using the replyTo address), and all recipients of the last message on this thread, with optional arguments.

argument.name: body
argument.doc: the body of the email

argument.name: options
argument.doc: a JavaScript object that specifies advanced parameters, as listed below
